Item.name: DE-Configurator
Item.description: Used to configurate some aspects of DynamicEuropa

Item.name: Mariner's Moonshine
Item.description: A special brand of rum, made with a concotion of sea mushrooms, psilotoad juices and matured in a rusty bathtub.

Item.name: Documents
Item.description: A folder containing some documents.

Item.name: Classified Documents
Item.description: An envelope containing classified documents.

Item.name: Classified Documents
Item.description: An envelope containing classified separatist documents.

Item.name: Nuclear Bomb
Item.description: A nuclear bomb, causing a massive fallout after detonation, killing everything in its path. 60 seconds until detonation when armed.

Item.name: Construction Material Crate
Item.description: A crate full of processed construction materials. Can be delivered to construction sites.

Item.name: Ducky Diving Suit
Item.description: A strange suit offered to you by your friend Jokster. It seems to be a custom modified PUCS suit with some swimming speed enhancements from the slipsuit.

Item.name: Coalition Military Radio
Item.description: A radio capable of calling into a coalition military frequency. Can be used to take over a separatist station of your choice.

Item.name: Separatist Military Radio
Item.description: A radio capable of calling into a separatist military frequency. Can be used to take over a coalition station of your choice.

Item.name: Military Radio
Item.description: A radio capable of calling into military frequency. Can be used to take over a station of your choice for the enemy of the currently residing faction.

Item.name: Kumo's Radio
Item.description: A radio Kazuya Kumo gave to you with a pre-configured frequency to call in a favor from her when docked to a separatist station.

Item.name: Sample VAX
Item.description: A genetically modified husk sample created by Dr. Seynomor. He claims that he "perfected" the formula and whoever uses it can gain the abilities of a husk without losing their mental capability. The instruction says, "To use it on yourself, hold right click and then press E."

Item.name: Alarm Buzzer
Item.description: TRIGGERS PIRATE ARMORY EVENT WHEN ACTIVATED TO MAKE PIRATES HOSTILE

Item.name: Bartender Chair
Item.description: TRIGGERS THE BARTENDER EVENT. DO NOT USE THIS IN YOUR BUILD UNLESS YOU'RE BUILDING A BAR MODULE OR SIMILAR AND YOU WANT TO TRIGGER THE EVENT THERE. NEVER USE IT IN A PLAYER SUBMARINE!

Item.name: Event - Charger Relay
Item.description: TRIGGERS THE CHARGING DOCK EVENT. DO NOT USE THIS IN ANY MODULE OTHER THAN THE AIRLOCK THAT IS SUPPOSED TO NOT SUPPLY POWER UNLESS PAID FOR!

Item.name: Triggered Event - Get Coalition Outpost Takeover Mission
Item.description: DO NOT PLACE/USE THIS! IT IS AUTOMATICALLY SPAWNED ON THE REQUIRED NPC!

Item.name: Triggered Event - Get Separatist Outpost Takeover Mission
Item.description: DO NOT PLACE/USE THIS! IT IS AUTOMATICALLY SPAWNED ON THE REQUIRED NPC!

Item.name: Triggered Event - Bartender
Item.description: DO NOT PLACE MULITPLE IN ONE MODULE AND SET THE MODULE TO ONLY SPAWN ONCE PER OUTPOST

Item.name: Triggered Event - Random
Item.description: TRIGGERS A RANDOM EVENT FROM OTHER EVENT TRIGGERS. DO NOT PLACE MULITPLE IN ONE MODULE AND SET THE MODULE TO ONLY SPAWN ONCE PER OUTPOST

Item.name: Triggered Event - Mudraptors
Item.description: DO NOT PLACE MULITPLE IN ONE MODULE AND SET THE MODULE TO ONLY SPAWN ONCE PER OUTPOST

Item.name: Triggered Event - Crawlers
Item.description: DO NOT PLACE MULITPLE IN ONE MODULE AND SET THE MODULE TO ONLY SPAWN ONCE PER OUTPOST

Item.name: Triggered Event - Husks
Item.description: DO NOT PLACE MULITPLE IN ONE MODULE AND SET THE MODULE TO ONLY SPAWN ONCE PER OUTPOST

Item.name: Triggered Event - Multi Wreck
Item.description: PLACE IN A WRECK THAT FEATURES SHUTTLES! DO NOT PLACE MULTIPLE IN ONE WRECK! DO NOT PUT INTO SHUTTLES THAT WILL BE ATTACHED TO A WRECK!

Item.name: Old pick-chisel
Item.description: Chip at piezo crystals with this

Item.name: Piezo Crystal Chunk
Item.description: A chunk of piezo crystal. Can be used as a makeshift battery... but don't drop it.
Spawn fishes for missions, to name

Item.name: huskeggsterrorist
Item.description: Only used by NPC in a mission, instantly gives 70 husk. SHOULD NOT BE SEEN BY PLAYERS
